single_crochet evenly around the bottom of hat and earflaps fasten_off and weave in ends cut 9 four foot lengths of yarn for each braid use a hook to pull through the bottom stitches of each earflap split the yarn into 3 equal groups of 6 strands each braid to desired length tie an overhand knot to secure trim ends to desired length approximately 2 inches crochet by carr do not copy share or sell
